      • getSide

        public int getSide(int x,
                   int y)
        Get the side a cell is on (0 if no side)
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate of the cell to check
        y - The y coordinate of the cell to check
        Returns:
        The ID of the side this cell touches, or 0 for no side

      • getAdj

        public Cell[] getAdj(int x,
                     int y)
        Gets all the adjacent cells
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate of the cell to get adjacencies for
        y - The y coordinate of the cell to get adjacencies for
        Returns:
        An array of size MAX_ADJ, containing the adjacent cells, cells will be null if they dont exist
